namedCrs.title: namedCrs
namedCrs.description: A GeoJSON CRS object that indicates a coordinate reference system by name.

type.description: A CRS object may indicate a coordinate reference system by name. In this case, the value of its "type" member must be the string "name".

name.description: The name of the coordinate reference system.

linkedObject.title: linkedObject
linkedObject.description: An object that links to a coordinate reference system definition.

href.description: A dereferenceable URI that links to the parameters for the coordinate reference system.

type.description: A string that hints at the format used to represent CRS parameters at the provided URI. Suggested values are: "proj4", "ogcwkt", "esriwkt", but others can be used.

linkedCrs.title: linkedCrs
linkedCrs.description: A GeoJSON CRS object that links to coordinate reference system parameters on the Web.

type.description: A CRS object may link to CRS parameters on the Web. In this case, the value of its "type" member must be the string "link".
